item.title: Singapore Science Park 1 will be testing a program for sharing personal mobility devices
item.description: Ascendas-Singbridge Group, a leading provider of sustainable urban and business space solutions in Asia, has partnered with Neuron Mobility, a smart transportation solutions provider, to pilot a personal mobility device (PMD) sharing program at Singapore Science Park 1. This six-month trial reflects the group’s commitment to enhancing accessibility and convenience for tenants, employees, and visitors within the park. Starting June 14, 2017, fifty GPS-equipped e-scooters and twenty bicycles will be available for rent at six designated parking zones throughout Singapore Science Park 1.
